title: Chicago Teachers to Return to Work in Schools, Ending Impasse
sub_head: Classes for students in Chicago to resume on Wednesday, ending dispute over Covid-19 protocols
body:
CHICAGOâ€”Officials announced a resolution to a teacher walkout over Covid-19 protocols as the city hit records for new cases of the virus.
Teachers will return to schools on Tuesday, a week after they voted to switch to online-only teaching, and students will begin classes again on Wednesday, said Mayor Lori Lightfoot.
